short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Provides fast and simple removal of cookies, tracking cookies, browsing history, download history and caches.
short.de: Entfernt einfach und schnell Cookies, Tracking Cookies, Browserverlauf, Downloadverlauf und Caches.
short.tr: Çerezlerin, izleme çerezlerinin, tarama geçmişinin, indirme geçmişinin ve önbelleklerin hızlı ve basit bir şekilde silinmesini ve…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This add-on quickly and easily removes cookies that save every surfing behavior for advertising purposes.
These so-called tracking and third-party cookies from third-party providers can be removed and blocked with a simple click.
long.de: Provides fast and simple removal of cookies, tracking cookies, browsing history, download history and caches.
